name: Master of the Wild
description:
You are a cool fox that has to survive in the wild, get stars to become the ultimate chad like Swagger Slug;

1.0.1 - Updated, Level 4 is playable;

1.0.2 - Updated, Damage and Died UI Fixed;

1.0.3 - Updated, Level 3 became level 4;

1.0.4 - Updated, added music;

1.0.5 - Updated, Fixed Level 1, Quit Button;
